channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: A young couple from London have ?325,000 to spend on a new rural home, and it's Sonali Shah who is leading the search in the Monmouthshire countryside. Sonali takes her buyers to visit a market garden using a novel `no dig' growing method that aims to preserve the soil with a lot less backbreaking work!
